channel.title: Blogs on SD
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on SD

item.title: Glampire Baby Herder!
item.description: Ludum Dare 44! Two more Ludum Dare gamejams passed which I was unable to participate in. When the third one rolled around and I realized another year had gone by I thought about entering but wasn’t very serious about it. That’s when @mackcam got in touch about working together for the gamejam. Heck yea, I was in for LD44! I figured this time I would keep a pretty casual attitude about completing our submission.

item.title: Bebop's Breakout!
item.description: Building a game in 72 hours A couple weeks ago after realizing (in shock) that it had been 5 years since my last GameJam, I decided to commit to LD41. For the uninitiated, GameJams are like hackathons for video games where you build a video game over the course of a weekend. Ludum Dare is one of the largest GameJams and it is run 3 times per year by the awesome @pov Mike.

item.title: Static Site Generator - Hugo
item.description: Building a website with Hugo Hugo is a static site generator written in Go (aka golang). It boasts about being super speedy and how it makes building websites fun again. So far I agree with their claims! The LiveReload feature enabled with hugo server --watch is awesome. I often don’t even need to reload the web page to see updates and the rebuilds occur on the order of 5-15 ms for this site.
